articles.author: Andrew Greene
articles.title: Australia dumps troubled European-designed Taipan helicopters for US Black Hawks and Seahawks - ABC News
articles.description: The Army will follow the Navy's decision to replace its locally produced Airbus MRH-90s with off-the-shelf Sikorsky-manufactured helicopters, in a move expected to cost billions of dollars.
articles.content: The Australian Defence Force will ditch its entire fleet of troubled European-designed Taipan helicopters a decade earlier than scheduled, replacing them with new Black Hawks and Seahawks imported fr… [+2800 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Vardhan
articles.title: New discovery by ESO scientists could change views about how planets are formed - Republic World
articles.description: In a first, scientists at the European Southern Observatory (ESO) have discovered a massive planet orbiting the biggest two-star system known to astronomers.
articles.content: The European Southern Observatory (ESO) has discovered a planet orbiting the most massive two-star system known. Discovered using the Very Large Telescope (VLT), the star system named 'b Centauri' ha… [+2185 chars]
